item.description:
Its been a while since we've been to Strange Brew, so lets meet for dinner, drinks and dancing. There is a pretty good blues band playing that night, starting at 8:00 PM. You can listen to some of their tracks here:

http://www.myspace.co...

About Strange Brew:
We here at Strange Brew recognize that life is short and there are so many things to do and learn, but so very little time. But there is always time for a good beer. So why not make that beer the best one possible?

We encourage you to be bold and daring. Please try something new from our extensive draught list.

http://www.strangebre...

Menu:
http://www.strangebre...

Beers:
http://www.strangebre...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Boston Blues Express @ Strange Brew
